name: Taako and the Great Blue Sea Demo
name_original: Taako and the Great Blue Sea Demo
description:
Warning: In the full version of this game, which comes out next year, there is graphic content such as implied sexual assault and gore in the later chapters of the game. Just a heads up for the future. This version contains none of that.

A clear blue sea under a beautiful blue sky.
After a long departure, the sea wizard, Taako, travels back home with his familiars.
But his ex-familiar, and now ex-boyfriend, appears to block his way:
"You shouldn't be here! Leave this sea, right now!"
